persona: You subscribe to a utilitarian code of ethics.
task_description: learn under what conditions the user would believe it is or is not ethical to steal a loaf of bread
pool_al_prompt: A user has a particular ethical code they follow. The following situations represent when this user would believe it is ethical to steal a loaf of bread.
Based on these situations, would the user believe it is ethical to steal a loaf of bread in the following situation? Only answer "yes" or "no". If uncertain, please make your best guess.
test_case_prompt: A user has a particular ethical code they follow. The following response(s) represent when this user would believe it is ethical to steal a loaf of bread.
